title: Echo of Passion
description: He had loved her then deserted her.Zoe Stroud had been completely shattered when Rory Ormond walked out of her life. Now she had a chance to repay some of the pain he'd caused her -- and prevent him from hurting someone else, too. As a successful London businesswoman, she felt she was strong enough to face him again, but Zoe had reckoned without the overwhelming force of Rory's passion. He wouldn't let her forget the love they'd once shared. Now Zoe had to choose. Should she desert Rory as he had once deserted her -- or rejoice in a love she thought she had lost forever?
author: Charlotte Lamb
